zombiescantgather.midnightconfig.zombies: Zombies can't pick up these items
zombiescantgather.midnightconfig.piglins: Piglins can't pick up these items
zombiescantgather.midnightconfig.showTra: Show tracker updates in the console
zombiescantgather.midnightconfig.trackCu: Track mobs with a custom name
zombiescantgather.midnightconfig.broadca: Broadcast tracker updates to OPs and users with the 'zombiescantgather.tracker.log' permission
zombiescantgather.midnightconfig.permiss:
The permission level needed to access Zombies Can't Gather commands.
See https://minecraft.wiki/w/Permission_level for permission levels. For more advanced
permission customization, use a permission manager like LuckPerms.
